description:
To add new text slides to your video, click on the add icon or 'Add text' button available in step to add the media, as shown below:



Afterwards, a window will pop open where you will be able to add a 50-character title and 50-character text. 



To add captions to the uploaded photos, click on 'Add Caption' under the photo or simply double click on the photo to which you would like to caption. A box will appear allowing you to add 50 character caption.
description_text: To add new text slides to your video, click on the add icon or 'Add text' button available in step to add the media, as shown below:         Afterwards, a window will pop open where you will be able to add a 50-character title and 50-character text.          To add captions to the uploaded photos, click on 'Add Caption' under the photo or simply double click on the photo to which you would like to caption. A box will appear allowing you to add 50 character caption.
title: How do I add text slides to my video?
